column1: #text=I was sitting home on a Saturday afternoon and was quite bored .
#text=I decided that I would enjoy reading , but I did n't have any books that I had n't read at home .
#text=So , off I went to the library .
#text=I got in my car and drove a mile down the street until I reached the library .
#text=Once there I browsed through the fiction books as those are my favorite until I found a book that I thought I would like to read .
#text=I picked up the book and took it up to the front desk .
#text=I pulled out my library card and the librarian scanned the book and then scanned my card .
#text=She put a bookmark in the book and told me when the book would be due back .
#text=I thanked her and proceeded to walk out to my car .
#text=I drove home and began reading the book and it was very enjoyable to read .
